body_html:
@leandro-gracia-gil Yes, patches are definitely welcome!

Some info on legal stuff here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md

Other than that, just send the patch like a regular github pull request (PR). Some github links on this topic:
https://help.github.com/articles/about-pull-requests/
https://help.github.com/articles/creating-a-pull-request/

Thanks!

body:
@leandro-gracia-gil Yes, patches are definitely welcome!

Some info on legal stuff here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md

Other than that, just send the patch like a regular github pull request (PR).  Some github links on this topic:
https://help.github.com/articles/about-pull-requests/
https://help.github.com/articles/creating-a-pull-request/

Thanks!
